Html:
I'm using Rawr b4.0.19. Mage model.

I've been playing with the Optimizer, loading the suggested set and optimizing again. Each time, spell hit seems to vary below and above cap, which is understandable since it's hard to get to 17.00 exactly. My questions: What is the range? Is there a way for me to manually control the range?
Use the optimizer requirements per the documentation.

Just wanted to follow up to day that I realize now that I can add a requirement when optimizing to add a lower limit for Hit Rating.

I'm still curious as to what the default lower limit is, though. In other words, what is considered an acceptably low hit rate (balanced with other factors)?
There's no set limit. Optimizer will choose whatever it finds gives the highest damage.
